vaccineGroup.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had an adverse reaction to a vaccine component.

vaccineGroup.observationTitle: Severe allergic reaction after previous dose of Hepatitis A
vaccineGroup.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction after a previous dose of Hepatitis A vaccine.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has had a severe allergic reaction to neomycin.
Do not vaccinate if the patient has a hypersensitivity to alum.

vaccine.contraindicationText: Do not vaccinate if the patient has a hypersensitivity to yeast.
